chunk: Ingredients: Saponified oils of organic cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, organic elaeis guineensis (palm) oil, organic olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, organic helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, organic citrus sinensis (orange) oil, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) oil, cananga odorata (ylang ylang) oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange peel), styrax

chunk: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, organic citrus sinensis (orange) oil, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) oil, cananga odorata (ylang ylang) oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange peel), styrax benzoin extract.

chunk:
Directions: Use daily for a clear, fabulous face. Pair with our toner a double dose of goodness.

Warnings: External Use Only. May Cause Blemishes To Disappear.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
